document_data.name: Caer-Konig
document_data.mainbody: '''Caer-Konig''' ({{Pronounce|kair|_|KOH|nig|refs=}}) was one of the towns of [[Ten Towns]] in [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Description: The town straddled the round harbor in a semicircle, with a line of buildings at the edge of the harbor, an uphill slope, and a circular round with buildings.
document_data.Geography:
Caer-Konig was located on the northern shore of [[Lac Dinneshere]], not far from [[Caer-Dineval]], behind the shadow of the imposing [[Kelvin's Cairn]].

The settlement was entirely isolated save for a trail to Caer-Dineval and a ferry that traversed the lake to [[Easthaven]].
document_data.Defenses: As of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the town could muster a mere 27 militia members to its defense.

Notable Locations.Landmarks:
*Market square, located on the eastern side of the city.
*Ruined caer (castle), located on a small hill above the town overlooking the harbor.
